Toggle Menu

Targets

Targets are static lists of Salt Minions that are created by optionally filtering and then selecting specific systems.

Select Minions from the Minions list and then click to populate a quick or saved target.

Quick Target

A group of saved systems to which you can apply a job, or save as a permanent Saved Target.

Quick Targets are saved in the database and persist between sessions, but you can have only one Quick Target.

Saved Targets

A saved list of systems.

Public and Private Targets

Public Targets are visible to all users that can log in to SaltStack Enterprise Web Console.

Private Targets are visible to only you.
